thread.title: Hair Designby Marc reviewed by Heather Watson
thread.title_full: Hair Designby Marc reviewed by Heather Watson

author: Heather Watson
title: Hair Designby Marc reviewed by Heather Watson
text: Marc Machado is an amazing hairstylist, he can really push your persona to a new level with his exquisite hair cutting skills. I highly recommend him to anyone in San Rafael looking for a very good hairstylist in an affordable price.
